description: Based on advanced M-AM/AM-M conversion, as are most vessels manufactured by JSS, the Camulos Vanguard is similar to its sibling the Camulos Raider except that it trades-off better armament for acceleration capabilities. The Camulos Vanguard is one of the stronger escort ships and often used on missions it wasnt originally intended for. Its tactical capabilities are notoriously underestimated.
name: Camulos Vanguard
